EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Spring Data Repositories 7AM.Confirmation 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Spring Webinars: Spring Data Repositories - Best Practices
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Spring Data Repositories: Best Practices with speaker Oliver Gierke and Thomas Darimont. We are looking forward to having you join us. To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, February 18, 2014 Europe: 3:00pm GMT (London, GMT) Join the WebEx <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=665449659> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 665 449 659
Thank you,
